方がまし: (ほうがまし) - I would rather; I would as lief do; strong preference
方がよろしい: (ほうがよろしい) - had better; is advisable
方がよろしければ: (ほうがよろしければ) - if you need; if it is necessary
方が付く: (かたがつく) - to settle (a problem); to put an end to (a dispute); to be disposed of; to be settled; to come to an end
方が増し: (ほうがまし) - I would rather; I would as lief do; strong preference
方が宜しい: (ほうがよろしい) - had better; is advisable
方が宜しければ: (ほうがよろしければ) - if you need; if it is necessary
方が良い: (ほうがよい) - (after past tense verb) had better (verb); (after negative verb) had better not (verb)
方丈: (ほうじょう) - square jo (approx. 10 sq feet); abbot's chamber; chief priest
方今: (ほうこん) - present time; now; nowadays
方位測定器: (ほういそくていき) - direction finder
方位神: (ほういじん) - God of directions (generic terms referring to many different Gods)
方偏: (ほうへん) - kanji "direction" radical at left (radical 70)
方円: (ほうえん) - squares and circles; square and round shapes
方向: (houkou) - direction, orientation, bearing, way; course (ex. de ação)
方向づけ: (ほうこうづけ) - directing; orienting; orientating; guiding; aligning
方向づける: (ほうこうづける) - to direct; to guide; to orient; to orientate; to align
方向を指す: (ほうこうをさす) - to point to a direction
方向付け: (ほうこうづけ) - directing; orienting; orientating; guiding; aligning
方向付ける: (ほうこうづける) - to direct; to guide; to orient; to orientate; to align
方向係数: (ほうこうけいすう) - direction coefficient
方向姓: (ほうこうせい) - trend/course of action/direction; directionality/directivity/orientation; directional/vectorial
方向性: (ほうこうせい) - trend/course of action/direction; directionality/directivity/orientation; directional/vectorial
方向感覚: (ほうこうかんかく) - sense of orientation; sense of direction
方向指示器: (ほうこうしじき) - direction indicator; traffic indicator; turn signal
方向探知器: (ほうこうたんちき) - direction finder
方向探知機: (ほうこうたんちき) - direction finder
方向観念: (ほうこうかんねん) - sense of direction
方向転換: (ほうこうてんかん) - (yoji) change of course
方向音痴: (ほうこうおんち) - (person with) no sense of direction; poor sense of locality
方塞がり: (かたふさがり) - unlucky direction (in Onmyoudou; due to the presence of a god such as Ten'ichijin)
方寸: (ほうすん) - a square sun (i.e. approx 9sq. cm.); one's mind/space occupied by one's heart
方方: (ほうぼう) - here and there; this way and that way; everywhere; all over
方案: (ほうあん) - plan/device/scheme/program; thoughts or suggestions about a law
方法: (houhou) - método, processo, maneira, modo, meio, técnica
方法的懐疑: (ほうほうてきかいぎ) - methodic doubt
方法論的個人主義: (ほうほうろんてきこじんしゅぎ) - methodological individualism
方眼紙: (ほうがんし) - graph paper; section paper
方程式: (ほうていしき) - equation/formula; method for solving a problem/set way of achieving a particular result
方程式の一項: (ほうていしきのいっこう) - member of an equation
方程式を導く: (ほうていしきをみちびく) - to derive a formula
方程式系: (ほうていしきけい) - system of equations
方術: (ほうじゅつ) - means; method; art; magic
方角: (ほうがく) - direction; way; compass point
方言周圏論: (ほうげんしゅうけんろん) - center versus periphery theory
方言量: (ほうげんりょう) - number of dialectal versions of a word
方違い: (かたたがい) - setting off the night before one normally would have departed, travelling in a different direction, spending the night there, and leaving for one's destination in the morning (done to avoid travelling in an unlucky direction; a common practice during the Heian period)
方違え: (かたたがえ) - setting off the night before one normally would have departed, travelling in a different direction, spending the night there, and leaving for one's destination in the morning (done to avoid travelling in an unlucky direction; a common practice during the Heian period)
方違え所: (かたたがえどころ) - (the へ is pronounced as え in this word)  place where one spends the night to avoid travelling in an unlucky direction
方違へ所: (かたたがへどころ) - (the へ is pronounced as え in this word)  place where one spends the night to avoid travelling in an unlucky direction
方針: (houshin) - política, plano, curso, princípio, objetivo; agulha magnética
方針を固める: (ほうしんをかためる) - to agree on the principle; to firmly establish a policy
方針決定: (ほうしんけってい) - policy decision
方錐: (ほうすい) - square drill; regular pyramid
方陣: (ほうじん) - square formation; magic square
方面: (ほうめん) - direction/district/area; field (e.g. of study)
方領: (ほうりょう) - square-shaped collar (of some traditional Japanese clothing)
方頭魚: (カナガシラ) - redwing searobin (species of gurnard, Lepidotrigla microptera)
於かれましては: (おかれましては) - in respect of; in regards to; as for
於多福: (おたふく) - homely woman (esp. one with a small low nose, high flat forehead, and bulging cheeks); plain woman
